title: South Live: Tuesday 13 March - BBC News
summary: nando 's asks reading restaurant fernando 's to rebrand .
southampton have sacked manager mauricio pellegrino .
operations postponed at the john radcliffe and horton general hospitals .

documents.title: good evening
text: that 's all for bbc south live until we resume at 08:00 on wednesday .
send your comments and stories to us via our oxford , hampshire , dorset , and berkshire facebook pages , or through our twitter accounts : @ bbc hampshire , @ twitterid @ twitterid and @ twitterid

documents.title: co-op supermarkets facing shortages
text: some co-op supermarkets in the south of england are experiencing product shortages which could take a few days to fully resolve .
the retailer blamed it on it issue at one depot .
it means it could have some empty shelves .
a spokesperson for the co-op , said : `` we have had an it issue at one of our depots in the south , which has affected some stores causing localised disruption .

`` we are very sorry that this has delayed a number of deliveries from our main depot , which is now fully operational , and we 're working hard to get products into stores as quickly as possible . ''

documents.title: grandmother 's abusive mother 's day card
text: grandmother 's abusive mother 's day card

documents.title: breakingman arrested over southampton hoglands park rape
text: a man has been arrested following the rape of a 26-year-old woman in a southampton park .
hampshire police said a 28-year-old man was arrested on sus of rape and remains in custody .
the woman was attacked in hoglands park on the evening of monday 5 march .

documents.title: trio arrested over care home 'neglect '
text: three women have been charged with ill-treatment of residents at a care home .
thames valley police was called to winterbrook nursing home in wallingford , oxfordshire , last june .
elizabeth collins , 61 , from didcot , and joan lovell , 63 , from wallingford , are charged with three counts of ill treatment .
mary craddock , 59 , from wallingford , faces five counts of the same charge .
they are due to appear at oxford magistrates ' court on 10 april .

documents.title: sacked pellegrino 'sorry ' for saints predicament
text: southampton 's former manager mauricio pellegrino has posted a letter to fans saying he `` tried to do my best every single day '' .
the letter on the saints club website said : `` i tried to give back to the club and tried to represent the club with pride .
some moments we managed this , some moments we could n't , but we have been living a difficult season for many reasons ''
he thanked fans , players and backroom staff and added he was `` so sorry to leave the club in this situation '' .
the argentine was sacked last night with the team just one point and one place above the premier league relegation zone with eight games left this season .

documents.title: grandmother sent abusive mother 's day card
text: a great-grandmother opened her mother 's day card to find abusive messages scrawled across it .
dorothy hopkins , 85 , said she was `` disgusted '' and `` upset '' after she opened the posted card from her daughter mandy .
the hateful card called the pensioner a vulgar description and was signed `` from the loving sorting office '' in maker pen .
royal mail apologised to mrs hopkins and launched an investigation into the `` criminal offence '' .

documents.title: memories of radiohead 's the bends
text: hard to believe it 's 23 years since the oxford band 's seminal album .

documents.title: in pictures : stars of the silver screen all at sea
text: some remarkable from the golden era of the great ocean liners .
cunard line was the first to introduce on-board photographers on its ships in the 1920s .
disembarking celebrities could be photographed jostling for space alongside fellow passengers .
travellers were able to put their orders in , and the photographs were then printed in southampton and posted around the world .
with access to the archives , photographer ian wright has edited down a selection of images of famous faces who travelled across the oceans .

documents.title: 'beloved father ' killed in car crash
text: a man has died in hospital after his car crashed into a tree in chandler 's ford , hampshire , last night .
ben ghafoor , 25 , from romsey , sustained serious injuries in the collision in winchester road at about 23:30 gmt and was pronounced dead a short time later , police said .
his family has paid tribute to a `` most beloved father , son and brother '' .

documents.title: man fined for reading festival touting
text: a man who was caught touting reading festival tickets outside the venue , has been fined more than £ 1000 .
leonard scott , from st asaph in wales , was found guilty in absence at reading magistrates ' court on 9 march after being spotted by police outside the gorge cafe in the town in august 2017 .
mr scott initially failed to pay a £ 75 penalty , so it was referred to reading magistrates ' court .
in court he was fined £ 660 , ordered to pay a victim 's surcharge of £ 66 and legal costs of £ 465 - a total of £ 1,191 .

documents.title: abuse claim home out of special measures
text: a care home where staff were accused of abusing residents has made `` significant improvements '' , a watchdog found .
winterbrook nursing home in wallingford , oxfordshire , was put in special measures by the care quality commission ( cqc ) in july 2017 .
it said concerns about abuse had been raised with the police and the local authority 's safeguarding team .

documents.title: reading 'fernando's-gate ' : the public speak
text: you will have seen the huge story about a chicken restaurant in reading which has fallen fowl of the nando 's legal team .
you can read about it here .
radio berkshire went out to hear from the public what they thought of the issue .
here are some of their responses :

documents.title: arrest over waitrose cash point raid
text: arrest over waitrose cash point raid

documents.title: drilling tests to assess landslip cliff
text: engineers are to assess the stability of cliffs above a dorset beach following a landslip .
an area at the top of the cliff has been closed since the landslide in late february 2017 .
the investigation involves drilling 30m ( 98ft ) holes on the top of canford cliffs on cliff drive and on the promenade to take soil samples .

documents.title: colnbrook power cut resolved
text: all supplies have been restored , thanks so much for your patience !

documents.title: new home needed for young flyers charity
text: a new home is needed for a charity that teaches young people to fly .
the upward bound trust has been given a month 's notice to leave its glider hangar based at haddenham , oxfordshire , because the airfield is being developed .
they need a flat piece of land to use as an airfield and to house its equipment .
`` it would be the end of 53 years of teaching young people to fly for next to no cost '' , said angus galbraith , chairman of trustees of the charity .

documents.title: reading face top-of-the-table test
text: there are two local football fixtures this evening , both featuring teams from berkshire .
reading , who have won just once in 16 championship matches , and are winless in seven , face top-of-the-table wolverhampton wanderers .
meanwhile , maidenhead united place boreham wood in the national league after a 7-1 hammering at the weekend .
commentary of that game is on the bbc sport website .

documents.title: power cuts around slough
text: scottish and southern electricity ( sse ) has apologised to people in 15 postcodes who are affected by a power outage .
some properties in areas around slough have lost supply .
we 're so sorry for the loss of supply affecting # colnbrook , # harmondsworth # longford # poyle and the surrounding areas of # slough .
we 're looking to have supplies restored by 13:30 , sorry for any inconvenience caused .

documents.title: 'loud bang ' on solent ferry
text: there was a loud bang , a metallic scrape , and i saw a member of staff who had been tieing up , be either thrown or jump out of the way .
the crew said there had been engine problem it made for a very frustrating journey .

documents.title: solent ferry crash forces boat 's withdrawal
text: one of the ferries that runs between southampton and the isle of wight has been withdrawn from service after it hit the berth at cowes last night .
operator red funnel say no-one was injured in the crash on the 19:45 gmt sailing , but the boat was damaged .
passengers had to then return to southampton to get another ferry to cross again .

documents.title: hunt to find stolen 60s hercules wreck
text: hunt to find stolen 60s hercules wreck

documents.title: virgin media offers rural fibre broadband
text: a local campaign , in conjunction with virgin media , has brought fibre broadband to rural communities in hampshire .
up to 4,000 residents in 12 villages in test valley and dun valley will be able to access `` ultrafast '' internet from late 2019 .
virgin says it is currently almost impossible for some residents and businesses to download or upload files .
the scheme will provide them with a 350mbps connection .

documents.title: southampton sack manager pellegrino
text: southampton sack manager pellegrino

documents.title: keb-gratulations are in order
text: a thame kebab van has skewered a double at the british kebab awards .
for the second year running , resul atalay and his twin sons , jason and josh , held onto the best kebab van title .
atalay 's kebab van , based on north street in the town - is famous for making its doner from scratch with a homemade chilli sauce containing a whopping 30 ingredients .
the award also comes with a small wooden spoon .

documents.title: oxfordshire hospitals nearly full
text: we are at an occupancy of 96-97 % .
we have very little room for manoeuvre because of the very high levels of emergency incidents .

documents.title: operations postponed at oxfordshire hospitals
text: two oxfordshire hospitals are postponing planned non-urgent operations for a second day today because of local pressures on the nhs .
following an 'exceptionally busy weekend ' , the trust has taken this action to support its emergency departments at the john radcliffe and the horton general hospitals .
the hospitals are aiming to reschedule all postponed operations within a month .

documents.title: pelligrino is gone , long live mark hughes ?
text: southampton should appoint mark hughes as their new manager until the end of the season , says robbie savage .
the saints sacked mauricio pellegrino last night after one win in 17 games left them a point and a place above the premier league relegation zone .
hughes has taken charge of nearly 450 premier league matches for blackburn , manchester city , fulham , qpr and stoke .
he also briefly played for the saints at the end of his career .
savage said : `` he played for southampton , and he will want to prove stoke wrong .
he has lots of experience . ''
southampton hope to have their new boss in place before facing wigan on sunday for a place in the fa cup semi-finals .

text: tuesday morning headlines

documents.title: tuesday morning 's travel chaos
text: my guess is that many of you have been sitting in your cars for longer than you planned this morning .
here is the latest on the roads .
travel : both main routes between bournemouth & christchurch very slow now ( hurn rd & castle lane east , past bournemouth hospital ) :
very slow into # witney town centre along # a4095 # woodstock rd from junction of jubilee way .
delays too along welch way , newland and # ducklington lane .

documents.title: hello sun
text: here 's is your today , straight from lucy martin , forecaster extraordinare .
she brings good news as she unfurls her weather scroll , with predictions of sunny spells .

documents.title: english channel hunt due for wreck of stolen hercules
text: divers are set to hunt for the wreck of a us transporter plane that was ditched in the english channel after being stolen by a military mechanic .
sgt paul meyer took the hercules c-130e transporter from mildenhall , suffolk , in a bid to fly home to his wife jane in virginia in may 1969 .
it disappeared from radar in the middle of the english channel , as sgt meyer flew it after a night of drinking .
the deeper dorset group is to use sonar gear to search for the crash site .

documents.title: hampshire 11-year-old wins international karate gold
text: hampshire 11-year-old wins international karate gold

documents.title: mother 's despair at son 's death in winchester prison
text: sean plumstead was three weeks away from his release from winchester prison , hampshire , when his mother , lisa dance , got the call all parents dread .
a police officer told her that sean , the eldest of her three children , was seriously ill in hospital .
`` i said 'is he still alive ? '
and they went 'just about , you need to get there straight away ' , '' recalls lisa .
when she arrived at hospital her son was in intensive care ; he 'd tried to hang himself and had suffered a brain injury .
read more of their story here .

documents.title: nando 's cries fowl over rival 's branding
text: an independent chicken shop says it is being `` bullied '' by nando 's because the chain is `` threatened '' by its success .
the chicken giant has launched legal action , accusing fernando 's in reading of copying its name and images .
but the berkshire eatery 's director said tv show take me out was the real inspiration behind the name .
nando 's said it wants the smaller outlet to rebrand because `` we believe it is trying to benefit from some of the things that make us who we are '' .

documents.title: good morning
text: good morning and welcome to south live .
we will be bringing you all of the latest news , travel , sport and weather until 18:00 .
